attributes.action: Create a key worker National Holiday
attributes.additional_details:
without our key workers, we would not be able to fight our current problems with the corona virus, from shop workers to surgical consultants and everyone in between.

they should all be recognised at the same time, not single any particular group out, let’s address all of them.
attributes.background: With all key workers that are currently keeping this country afloat, we should have a national annual bank holiday to recognise them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
